org.usfirst.frc.team2228.robot

Class AdvancedJoystick

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.GenericHID
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
        • org.usfirst.frc.team2228.robot.AdvancedJoystick

  • public class AdvancedJoystick
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
    A Class extending joystick meant for modifying how input is viewed

        public double getTwist()
        Overrides:

      • setLinearMode

        public boolean setLinearMode(double min,
                             double max,
                             double maxLimit,
                             double minLimit,
                             double curvature,
                             boolean invert)
        sets the linear modes
        Parameters:
        min - all joystick values up to this will map to zero (range 0-1)
        max - all joystick values past this will map to (range 0-1)
        limit - the max value for the magnitude (range 0-1)
        curvature - how curved the input to output graph for the joystick is, (percent: range 0-1)
        invert - whether or not to invert the joystick

      • setRotationalMode

        public boolean setRotationalMode(double min,
                                 double max,
                                 double limit,
                                 double curvature,
                                 boolean invert)
        sets the rotation modes
        Parameters:
        min - all joystick values up to this will map to zero (range 0-1)
        max - all joystick values past this will map to (range 0-1)
        limit - the max value for the magnitude (range 0-1)
        curvature - how curved the input to output graph for the joystick is, (percent: range 0-1)
        invert - whether or not to invert the joystick

      • defaultMode

        public void defaultMode()
        sets joystick modes to default values

      • basicMode

        public void basicMode()
        sets joystick modes to basic values (direct input)

      • setBypass

        public void setBypass(boolean bool)
        set the bypass flag if true, getMagnitude() and getTwist() will return their relative values from the superclass, without mapping
        Parameters:
        bool - new value for bypass
